Death Knight

Death Knights are powerful undead warriors found in the Necropolis areas of the dungeon in Remixed Dungeon.

Stats

  • HP: 35
  • Defense Skill: 12
  • Attack Skill: 15
  • Damage: 7-14
  • Armor: 7
  • EXP: 7
  • Max Level: 15

Description

At first glance, this is a mighty warrior in heavy armor, and only a dead grin gives him away. The death knight is a manifestation of the soul of a knight who failed to pursue his vows. And in his cursed state, he will always wander seeking to purge in battle, killing the innocent, unable to remember who he swore to protect.

Behavior

  • Powerful melee combat
  • Has a 1/7 chance to deal double damage on each attack (proc)
  • Part of the undead category
  • Appears in Necro levels 2-4 according to Bestiary.json, with higher spawn rates in necro4

Drops

Death Knights typically drop:

  • Gold (rarely)
  • Standard mob drops

Special Notes

  • Very powerful undead enemy with high stats
  • Has a chance to proc double damage on hits
  • Part of the necropolis area enemies
  • May appear as a requirement in Plague Doctor's questline

Spawn Rates

According to Bestiary.json:

  • necro2: 0.5 spawn rate
  • necro3: 0.5 spawn rate
  • necro4: 1.5 spawn rate
rpd, mobs, death knight, undead, melee
